        void setCardEnabled(DevCardType cardType,

        Sets the enable/disable state for the specified card type.
        Parameters:
        cardType - The card type being enabled or disabled
        enabled - Whether or not to enable the card type

      • setCardAmount

        Sets the amount for the specified card type.

        amount - The new card amount
